Office Partitions

We Supply & install various types of partitioning using well known suppliers CCF, SIG and Nevill Long.


  • Glazed partition systems

    full height single or double glazed systems with integral blinds or manifestations. Acoustic and fire rated systems available. Half height solid and glazed systems. Glass doors or timber doorsets available


  • Solid partition systems

    Plasterboard systems with Aluminium Head and abutment channels, complete with doors and frames and ironmongery. Decorating also carried out.


  • Demountable partition systems

    Partitions that can be unmounted, relocated and reinstalled in a new location.


  • Dry lining

    Plasterboarding of internal faces of buildings such as walls and ceilings. Different types of plasterboards depending on site requirements are fitted to stud partitioning systems. We then carry out Taping & jointing. We can also decorate and apply skirting boards and doorsets where required.

Office Refurbishments

We offer a full office refurbishment or part office refurbishment to suit your business needs. Whether it is a relocation to new premises or an adaption or expansion of your current premises we can accommodate your needs. From helping with design ideas through to completion of works we can carry out all your requirements. We offer a full refurbishment package or any individual parts of the refurbishment that are required:


  • Demolition/strip out of current set up.
  • New partitions
  • New doors and frames and ironmongery
  • Suspended ceilings
  • Electrical and data points and lighting
  • Floor coverings
  • Tea Points & Kitchens
  • Decoration works
  • Signage
  • Blinds and manifestations
  • Demounting and reconfiguring of current partitions to form new layouts
